definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Niao3 lei4 Xue2 hui4

sentences.english: He was editor of The Auk.
sentences.chinese: 他曾是著名鳥類學期刊《海雀》的編輯。

sentences.english: Vs with their thumbs and forefingers, measuring angles.
sentences.chinese: 鳥類學家們用大拇指和食指構成v形量測角度。

sentences.english: That area is an ornithologist's paradise.
sentences.chinese: 那個地區是鳥類學家的天堂。

sentences.english: His main interests are botany and ornithology.
sentences.chinese: 他主要對植物學和鳥類學感興趣。

sentences.english: The ornithologists made Vs with their thumbs and forefingers, measuring angles.
sentences.chinese: 鳥類學家們用大拇指和食指構成V形量測角度。

sentences.english: What are ornithologists on Twitter most interested in this week?
sentences.chinese: Twitter上的鳥類學家本週最關心什麼？

sentences.english: It was one of the ornithologists.
sentences.chinese: 是一個鳥類學家打來的。

sentences.english: I felt like an ornithologist looking for a rare species.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得自己好像是一個正在尋找稀有物種的鳥類學家。

sentences.english: The Journal of Ornithology reported the findings.
sentences.chinese: 在鳥類學雜誌報道的結果。
